title: About my entry in the art contest @Riot
body:
I have allowed my self to get carried away in forming an interesting background for my entry (now posted on Instagram) and added the Riot logo of the fist to represent the sun. Once reading the rules after i posted, i realised it says you mustn't add logos to your artwork. Does this my entry will not be eligible for the prize?
I also asked on the Ocean Week Q&A but no one responded so quickly...
